raw: {"forward-looking_planning":135,"preventive_measures":130,"stakeholder_communication":110,"overall_score":125,"comments":"The CEO displays exceptional forward-looking planning through scenario planning and stress testing, indicating a genius-level capability in anticipating long-term risks. Preventive measures are proactively and comprehensively implemented, demonstrating strong risk mitigation. Stakeholder communication is addressed indirectly through fostering a culture of risk awareness, though explicit communication strategies could be more detailed."}
comments: The CEO displays exceptional forward-looking planning through scenario planning and stress testing, indicating a genius-level capability in anticipating long-term risks. Preventive measures are proactively and comprehensively implemented, demonstrating strong risk mitigation. Stakeholder communication is addressed indirectly through fostering a culture of risk awareness, though explicit communication strategies could be more detailed.
